title: History Goes Bump Halloween Special 2014
itunes:title: HGB Halloween Special 2014
description:
This is the History Goes Bump Halloween Special. Join us as we share a brief history of Halloween and then we share listeners true ghost stories that are sure to chill you to the bone! Haunted theaters, homes and the return of loved ones!

Check out our website:  http://historygoesbump.com

And become a member of the Spooktacular Crew by supporting the show in a variety of ways:  sharing on social networks, contributing stories, subscribing to the show and newsletter, donating financially!
